description: Detects usage of the "msedge.exe" binary as a LOLBIN to download arbitrary file via the CLI
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Software that uses MsEdge to download components in the background (see ParentImage, ParentCommandLine)
name: Potential Arbitrary File Download Via MSEdge.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\msedge.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"msedge.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*.exe\ http*" OR "*msedge\ http*"))
